question: Who is to lead the Indian delegation to the 50th World Economic Forum meeting, to be held at Davos?
explanation:
Union Minister for Commerce and Industry Piyush Goyal is to lead the Indian delegation to the 50th World Economic Forum meeting, to be held at Davos from 20th January,2020. 
Piyush Goyal will be accompanied by the Union Minister of State for Shipping and Chemical and Fertilizers Mansukh Mandaviya and Chief Ministers of the States of Madhya Pradesh and Karnataka and other senior officials. The theme of this year’s meeting of the World Economic Forum is \'Stakeholders for a Cohesive and Sustainable World\'. Every year, the WEF holds meeting in Davos, to provide a global platform for world’s top leaders for a multilateral discussion.
